section name: Classification of Radiolarian Fossil Zones and Environmental Analysis of Gufeng Formation in Lower Yangtze Region
location of the samples and sections: 2 km southwest of Xiaodong, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China
Xiaodong and Bancheng Counties of Qinzhou Area, SE Guangxi
Xiaodong, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China
associated fossils: Al-baillellaria, spherical radiolaria, Latentifistularia, Entactinaria, hexactinellids, demosponges
Hegleria mammilla, Latentifistula texana, Pseudotormentus kamigoriensis, and Quadrimis glacilis
lithology: Red-to-yellow red cherts and yellow-to-yellow brown siliceous siltstones
